General.Name: Guangdong Baolihua New Energy Stock Co LTD
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Guangdong Baolihua New Energy Stock Co., Ltd. engages in the power and finance business in China. The company generates power using coal and wind sources. It also provides financial investment services. Guangdong Baolihua New Energy Stock Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
